titles.title: The Way Of The Wicked He Turneth Upside Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The way of the wicked He turneth upside down
He turned upside down, He turned upside down.
The way of the wicked He turneth upside down
Lord turn me right side up and lead me in Thy way.
Lead me in Thy way, Oh Lord, please help me stand;
Lead me in Thy way, obeying each command;
Lead me in Thy way, please take me by Thy hand
And turn me right side up and lead me in Thy way.
